Package index

Core Functions

neuroCleaner()
Clean and Load Data from NIfTI Neuroimaging Files
databaseCreator()
Create a Database of Processed PET Image Data
matrixCreator()
Convert Database to Functional Data Matrix Format
meanNormalization()
Mean Normalization for Matrix Data

SCC Evaluation

getPoints()
Extract Significant SCC Points from an SCC Comparison Object
getSPMbinary()
Extract SPM-Detected Significant Points from a Binary NIfTI File
processROIs()
Process ROI Voxel Data from a NIfTI File
calculateMetrics()
Evaluate SCC or SPM Detection Performance

Secondary Functions

neuroContour()
Obtain and save neuroimaging contours from a NIFTI file
getDimensions()
Get Dimensions from a Neuroimaging File
generatePoissonClones()
Generate Synthetic Poisson Clones for PET Data

Datasets

SCCcomp
Example SCC Computation Result
calculateMetricsExample
Precomputed Inputs for SCC vs. SPM Performance Evaluation
